summary: SummaryAquaphor Lip Repair Stick SPF 30 repairs and protects very dry lips.
details: DetailsBenefitsImmediately soothes very dry, chapped lipsLips look and feel betterProvides effective long-lasting moistureBroad spectrum SPF 30#1 Dermatologist recommended brand for dry, chapped lipsWith Vitamins and Shea ButterFormulated WithoutFragranceParabenItem 2594843IngredientsActive Ingredients: Avobenzone 3%, Homosalate 9%, Octisalate 4.5%, Octocrylene 9%.Inactive Ingredients: Octyldodecanol, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Beeswax, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Wax, Cetearyl Alcohol, Dimethicone, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax, Tocopheryl Acetate, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Tocopherol.

reviews.headline: Horrible taste
reviews.comments: No matter what i do, this product always makes it into my mouth and the taste is horrible. Due to its thick formula the taste doesnt go away with taking a drink. It is hydrating and it does a good job protecting from sunburns, I wouldn't recommend

reviews.headline: Horrible Taste!!!
reviews.comments: I love Aquafor, but this SPF 30 lip balm is nasty! I couldnt figure it out the first few times I wore it, but once I figured out it gross taste was coming from this, I immediately stopped using it. I CANNOT do the nasty aftertaste. I have not touched it since.

reviews.headline: A staple in my everyday life
reviews.comments: I use this daily and love love love it. I'm protected from the sun and am moisturized.

reviews.headline: Works well
reviews.comments: Works well. Stays on a long time. It does have a bit of a bad taste but it's tolerable especially for good spf coverage.

reviews.headline: Hydrating, No Weird Taste
reviews.comments: Leaves my lips feeling hydrated. Love the SPF 30.  The hydration only lasts a couple of hours, but for sunscreen purposes, I don't mind that since you're supposed to reapply every couple of hours.  I didn't experience any off putting sunscreen smell or taste when applying this

reviews.headline: Great chapstick
reviews.comments: This is a great chapstick to keep on you, and I love using it. It's more on the thick, balmy side, so it provides a moisturizing layer that you gradually absorb. I noticed a lot of reviews mentioning a bad taste, but I'm almost entirely through my tube, and still haven't been in a scenario where the taste bothered me. It just tastes like chapstick.

reviews.headline: Tastes really gross
reviews.comments: Overall it's okay when it comes to moisturizing your lips but it tastes like balloons lol. Not something I would want on my lips all day.

reviews.headline: Wanted to love this.
reviews.comments: Love Aquaphor products and use them often, especially on lips so I was thrilled to get this. Unfortunately, I cannot stand the taste of the sunscreen so I won't be using this anymore. Will check to see if there is a version w/out the SPF.

reviews.headline: A summer must have !
reviews.comments: I have several of this lip balm with spf. I keep one in my car, purse, office, bathroom, bedside table etc.  Provides moisture especially after I exfoliate my lips. Love the spf for all year long too.

reviews.headline: Have to reapply often
reviews.comments: I typically love Aquaphor, but this item is not it. I have to constantly reapply. It makes my lips even drier than they were before.

reviews.headline: would get the ones without sunscreen
reviews.comments: It isnt very hydrating and tastes like sunscreen

reviews.headline: Best lip balm
reviews.comments: Absolutely my fav lip protection! No more chapped lips - summer or winter. Keeps my lips feeling so soft.

reviews.headline: It's amazing
reviews.comments: Loved with the product

reviews.headline: This product made me have acne..
reviews.comments: I used this product last winter and it gave me pimples all around my mouth. I had to go to my dermatologist to get rid of the last one. IT WILL STOPUP THE FOLICLES AROUND YOUR LIPS.

reviews.headline: Not hydrating
reviews.comments: The more I used this chapstick, the worse my lips felt

reviews.headline: Didn't work for my lips, but I used it as an
reviews.comments: ….undereye sun protectiom and moisturizer. It works like a charm. My concealer holds on to it throughout the day. I actually also use it on the go for forehead on those no make-up days.

reviews.headline: Bought another tube after a week of use
reviews.comments: This is not for you if you are expecting a flavor and aroma like vanilla.  It's also not for you if you don't dig heavy balms. If I had to describe the taste I'd say it has sort of a regular chap stick flavor and the aroma is so subtle, it's almost unscented. I bought this to restore my lips after a week at the beach and I had instant results. My lips were dry from sun exposure, salt water, chlorine and the unexpired SPF30 lip balm I brought along failed to protect.  I swiped Aquaphor Lip Repair Stick on and instantly, my lips looked much better, didn't feel dry and because the balm is heavy it stayed on my lips to continue to heal. I had to buy another tube for my purse, I just don't want to be without this comfort and relief. The added SPF30 is just the cherry on top of the sundae. It doesn't have a cutsey tube or a trendy flavor, it just WORKS.

reviews.headline: Not sure if I'd buy again
reviews.comments: Feels like nothing is on my lips, doesn't feel very moisturizing, and sometimes i can taste it and it doesn't taste good.

reviews.headline: This product is more than lips..but under eye primer.
reviews.comments:
Under eye primer..stops makeup from creasing and caking..see Risa does makeup .
☆☆☆☆☆

reviews.headline: Good lip sunscreen.
reviews.comments: I would'nt use this for everyday wear only because if you lick your lips its going to taste bad like suncreen. But its good to use if your going swimming, to the beach, etc..

If I had to describe the taste I'd say it has sort of a regular chap stick flavor and the aroma is so subtle, it's almost unscented. faceoff_positive.headline: Bought another tube after a week of use

faceoff_negative.comments: I'm so glad I at least bought this terrible item at a discount, and not full price. But sadly I can't return this item anymore… Anyway, this "lip repair" stick is an awful product which dries your lips out instantly, and makes you feel like you have to almost instantly reapply a second coat after your fresh coat. The taste is of pure sunblock, I knew this product had SPF but I was thinking it was going to have an actually bearable taste, this just feels like you're chugging a bottle of sunscreen. Would NOT recommend this, just stick with a classic chapstick, or carmex tube instead of this, at least THOSE will somewhat do their job.
faceoff_negative.headline: "Lip Repair"? More like Lip RIPPER.
